name: Bob and the Dungeon of Latomia
name_original: Bob and the Dungeon of Latomia
description:
This game is an roguelike auto battler perma-death game, you must improve your character so that he can withstand the worst battles.

At first it will be difficult but with time you will be OVERPOWER
  • Game Goal : Conquer the Dungeon
  • Each floor will be more difficult than the previous one
  • Strategy is always choosing your battles and knowing when to back off.
  • On each floor there will be a boss, several elites and a few more mobs, you must collect as many skills and weapons as you can to withstand the challenges ahead 
    • TIPS

    Get the Potions!

    out side the old man will give for free potions to you adventure!

    ESCAPE IF U CAN NOT WIN!

    VISUAL ART

    MAP TILE ASSETS : 16_16_jerome From opengameart.org

    MINOTAUR SPRITE: ONLINE doesnt find author

    SOUNDS Music and SFX FROM: https://tabletopaudio.com/
